statements: SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_title, total_value FROM contracts;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM contracts ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT contract_title, total_value FROM contracts WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_title = 'Software Development Contract' ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, contract_title FROM contracts WHERE total_value > 10000 ORDER BY total_value DESC
SELECT contract_title, total_value FROM contracts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY total_value ASC
SELECT contract_title, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE total_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_title, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contracts ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id FROM contracts WHERE contract_amount > 10000;
SELECT key_date_type, key_date FROM key_dates WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND contract_amount > 10000 ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT contract_title, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT contract_title, contract_amount FROM contracts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT contract_title, supplier_id FROM contracts INNER JOIN key_dates ON contracts.contract_id = key_dates.contract_id WHERE key_date > '2022-07-01'
SELECT contract_title, key_date_type, key_date FROM contracts INNER JOIN key_dates ON contracts.contract_id = key_dates.contract_id WHERE key_date_type = 'Payment Due'
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT supplier_name, contract_date FROM contracts WHERE contract_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agreement_type, end_date FROM agreements WHERE agreement_type = 'Service';
SELECT supplier_id, start_date FROM agreements ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, key_date_name, key_date_date FROM key_dates WHERE key_date_type = 'Reminder';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A' ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_type, start_date, end_date FROM agreements WHERE supplier_id = 101 ORDER BY agreement_id;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_name, contract_date, expiry_date FROM contracts WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_type, start_date, end_date FROM agreements WHERE end_date < '2021-06-30' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT key_date_id, key_date_name, key_date_type, key_date_date FROM key_dates WHERE agreement_id = 201 ORDER BY key_date_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_date, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, contract_date FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, contact_person FROM suppliers JOIN contracts ON suppliers.supplier_id = contracts.supplier_id;
SELECT contract_id, amount FROM procurement WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT contract_id, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM key_dates WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE ORDER BY key_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM procurement GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, start_date, end_date FROM contracts ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT contract_id, type, date_value FROM key_dates WHERE type = 'deadline' ORDER BY date_value;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, amount FROM procurement WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT agreement_text, signature_date FROM agreements WHERE contract_id IN (SELECT contract_id FROM contracts WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01');
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, amount, payment_due_date FROM procurement ORDER BY payment_due_date DESC;
